unnormalised: Understanding state budgets, like Maharashtra's, is crucial. They determine funding for sectors from education (IIT Bombay!) to infrastructure (Mumbai-Pune Expressway). Allocations reflect policy priorities; look at health spending vs. capital expenditure. Consider how schemes like MGNREGA are impacted. Changes affect everyday life, like PDS and even Onam celebrations in Kerala due to state funding. Analysis helps hold governments accountable.
